item.title: Death’s Misunderstood Sting
item.description: The U.K. debate about medically assisted suicide involves a certain denial of the true state of humanity.

item.title: Democrats’ Influencer Army Misses the Point of New Media
item.description: If Democrats want to succeed online, they’d do better to foster genuine debate than to manufacture consent.

item.title: San Antonio’s McNay Art Museum, Texas’s Modern-Art Pioneer
item.description: Starting with a palatial home, French avant-garde art, and one woman’s vision, it’s become a unique cultural treasure.

item.title: California Teachers’ Union Ruins an Earnest Effort to Confront Antisemitism
item.description: And in so doing, has helped demonstrate why California’s schools, once among the best in the nation, are now among its worst.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil Deportation Case Shifts Focus to Material Misrepresentations
item.description: This is significant, but administration tactics have created openings for district judges to intrude in such cases.
